body.name: Cold Brew Mason Jar iced Coffee Maker, Durable Glass, - 64 oz (2 Quart / 1.9 Liter), With Handle& Stainless Steel Filter for Iced Brew Coffee, Lemonade, Ice Tea, Homemade Fruit Drinks Container

FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EASY-TO-USE COLD BREW MAKER: Simply add coffee, steep overnight, and enjoy fresh cold brew straight from the pitcher. Cleanup is a breeze with dishwasher-safe components (do not add boiling water).

STAINLESS STEEL FILTER: The stainless steel coffee filter is constructed of premier quality mesh, exquisite and durable, could prevent coffee grounds from entering the jar, makes the iced coffee taste better.

EASY POUR DISPENSER, LEAK-PROOF LID: With the flip cap lid, brewing, pouring and storage is easy! It turns your mason jar pitcher into a cold brew coffee pitcher in a flash.（We also include a free lid.）

DURABLE MASON JAR: Our 64 oz mason jar pitcher with lid is made of heavy duty glass and high quality plastic. Which are certified food grade, BPA free, Lead free, thick and durable to withstand daily use.Our product shipping guarantee ensures full replacement or refund for any damaged items, providing you with peace of mind and satisfaction.
COFFEE AT HOME: Perfect for the home office, our mason jar cold brew coffee maker saves you a trip to the coffee shop while you work from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes great cold brew
reviews.reviewText: I have been making my own cold brew for a year or so and had a different caraffe and strainer setup. It worked okay, the holes in the strainer were a bit large I think, so I had a lot of sediment, even with a coarse grind. On top of that, the caraffe was known for being fragile and one day my husband proved that theory, shattering it all over the kitchen when he barely bumped it. But we aren't here to talk about that disappointment. We are here to talk about the good cold brew this makes! Let me just say this strainer is much better already after making my first batch! Coffee is clear. The strainer is easy to empty and clean and the jar seems robust! I did see a review stating theirs broke, but I think it was due to heat shock. So note to self, no hot water in this one. I think the strainer and kids will also be compatible with other jars I have so I might be able to be brewing while I use one! That's a win win! The size is nice too. It will likely last us 2 days of cold brew worth. The value is good as well, when you look at the price of store bought cold brew at about $6 for the same amount you can make yourself, let alone the cost at a coffee chain. Look up how to make cold foam and you're set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my Cold brew mason jar first because it is beautiful, super quality, the glass is thick and feels very strong, also the lid with the handle, so it is easy to handle and has parts that block water spillage, it is big enough to have a good amount of tea or coffee ready in my refrigerator. and well finally and maybe part of the most important thing is that the result is a delicious taste, whether it is coffee or fruits that you can put in the part intended for it. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Useful and Beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This is such a beautiful looking product. We are coffee lovers and we love this Mason jar. It’s very easy to use, looks super, and is sturdy. It just looks like the picture and does the job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cold brew!
reviews.reviewText: This works so well! It was an easy process and it tastes just like cold brew from a coffee shop. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love making iced coffee at home. I have bought a few in the past that have never worked well but this one is amazing. I got the 64oz and it’s perfect to last a few days. It has very thick glass so it won’t break easy and the filter where you put the coffee grounds have the perfect size holes so none of the grounds go into your coffee like the other ones I’ve bought. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love love my cold brew kit!
reviews.reviewText: Ive never made ice coffee at home before until I got this cold brew kit and now I don’t drink my coffee any other way! Literally haven’t purchased ice coffee since getting this!Coffee tastes so much better, fresher and stronger than the watered down ones I use to buy ! I am saving money and getting a nice fresh cup of ice coffee every day!My only complaint is I had to buy a mixing spoon separately. It is much needed in order for the coffee grains to be evenly distributed inside the metal piece but other than that in My eyes this product is a win win !! 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and easy to use. Easy to handle to pour. Only thing I don't like is if you use fine ground then I find some in the coffee and leaves a thick film in the bottom. I purchased the funnel type paper filters at Walmart and used those too and it clears the issue up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve wanted to brew loose leaf tea in bulk but didn’t have a strainer large enough. This system is amazing! The strainer fits right inside the very large jar and the jar has this awesome lid to pour straight from there.I haven’t used it for coffee yet, but that is the next addition to my list. I also want to make infused water with fruits. This thing is awesome.
